snippet: Mental health records concerning former Secretary of State Dianna Duran will remain under seal ahead of a sentencing hearing that could hinge on evidence about her gambling addiction.
abstract: New Mexico judge rules mental health records of former Sec of State Dianna Duran, who has pleaded guilty to felony embezzlement, will remain under seal; decision comes before upcoming sentencing hearing that may be impacted by Duran's claims of long-term gambling addiction.
lead_paragraph: Mental health records concerning former Secretary of State Dianna Duran will remain under seal ahead of a sentencing hearing that could hinge on evidence about her gambling addiction.

headline.main: New Mexico: Ex-Official’s Health Records Stay Sealed
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Mental Health Records of Ex-Secretary of State Stay Sealed
